Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1980...
Traded from Cleveland to Baltimore on 7/31/1982 (Going to CLE: SS R. Burleson. Going to BAL: P T. Candiotti, P C. Leibrandt)...
Injured on 7/9/1983 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1986...
Injured on 4/14/1990 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Baltimore to Chicago (N) on 6/23/1992 (Going to CHC: 3B H. Matsunaga, P T. Candiotti. Going to BAL: LF H. Rodriguez, P D. Lowe)...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/8/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $478,545 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/1994 to a 2-year deal worth $3,330,000 per year...
Injured on 4/8/1994 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
